TopicTitle: Weird KSP ingame environment, how to fix?

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow humans, Im fairly new to KSP and have been modding the game. Recently, my game sudden has this weird haze effect towards it, pic as below. Once i escape Kerbin atmosphere everything seems to be fine and only seem to be on Kerbin (Never been to other bodies),  

Im not sure which mod causes this to happen and i am assuming it is a graphical mod, Ive got kopernicus, EVE,  Astronomer Visual Pack, scatterer, texturereplacer.

Anyone knows how i can fix this issue? Thx

5 hours ago, RhoOphuichi said:

Hello fellow humans, Im fairly new to KSP and have been modding the game. Recently, my game sudden has this weird haze effect towards it, pic as below. Once i escape Kerbin atmosphere everything seems to be fine and only seem to be on Kerbin (Never been to other bodies),  

Im not sure which mod causes this to happen and i am assuming it is a graphical mod, Ive got kopernicus, EVE,  Astronomer Visual Pack, scatterer, texturereplacer.

Anyone knows how i can fix this issue? Thx

Turn scatterer Ocean shaders off, is the current work around
